an5.62:1.1: “Mendicants, these five perceptions, when developed and cultivated, are very fruitful and beneficial. They have freedom from death as their objective and culmination.
an5.62:1.3: The perceptions of impermanence, not-self, death, repulsiveness of food, and dissatisfaction with the whole world.
an5.62:1.4: These five perceptions, when developed and cultivated, are very fruitful and beneficial. They have freedom from death as their objective and culmination.”
